verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> you now <S%H4994><s%> what <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said; <S%H559><s%> Arise, <S%H6965><s%> contend <S%H7378><s%> you before <S%H854><s%> the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and let the hills <S%H1389><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> your voice. <S%H6963><s%>

Hear <S%H8085><s%> you, O mountains, <S%H2022><s%> the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> controversy, <S%H7379><s%> and you strong <S%H386><s%> foundations <S%H4146><s%> of the earth: <S%H776><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has a controversy <S%H7379><s%> with his people, <S%H5971><s%> and he will plead <S%H3198><s%> with Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
O my people, <S%H5971><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> have I done <S%H6213><s%> to you? and wherein <S%H4100><s%> have I wearied <S%H3811><s%> you? testify <S%H6030><s%> against me.

For I brought <S%H5927><s%> you up out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and redeemed <S%H6299><s%> you out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of servants; <S%H5650><s%> and I sent <S%H7971><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and Miriam. <S%H4813><s%>

O my people, <S%H5971><s%> remember <S%H2142><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> Balak <S%H1111><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> consulted, <S%H3289><s%> and what <S%H4100><s%> Balaam <S%H1109><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Beor <S%H1160><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> him from Shittim <S%H7851><s%> to Gilgal; <S%H1537><s%> that you may know <S%H3045><s%> the righteousness <S%H6666><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

With which <S%H4100><s%> shall I come <S%H6923><s%> before <S%H6924><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and bow <S%H3721><s%> myself before the high <S%H4791><s%> God? <S%H430><s%> shall I come <S%H6923><s%> before <S%H6924><s%> him with burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings, with calves <S%H5695><s%> of a year <S%H8141><s%> old? <S%H1121><s%>

Will the LORD <S%H3068><s%> be pleased <S%H7521><s%> with thousands <S%H505><s%> of rams, <S%H352><s%> or with ten <S%H7233><s%> thousands <S%H7233><s%> of rivers <S%H5158><s%> of oil? <S%H8081><s%> shall I give <S%H5414><s%> my firstborn <S%H1060><s%> for my transgression, <S%H6588><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of my body <S%H990><s%> for the sin <S%H2403><s%> of my soul? <S%H5315><s%>

He has showed <S%H5046><s%> you, O man, <S%H120><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> is good; <S%H2896><s%> and what <S%H4100><s%> does the LORD <S%H3068><s%> require <S%H1875><s%> of you, but to do <S%H6213><s%> justly, <S%H4941><s%> and to love <S%H160><s%> mercy, <S%H2617><s%> and to walk <S%H3212><s%> humbly <S%H6800><s%> with your God? <S%H430><s%>

The LORD's <S%H3068><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%> cries <S%H7121><s%> to the city, <S%H5892><s%> and the man of wisdom <S%H8454><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> your name: <S%H8034><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> you the rod, <S%H4294><s%> and who <S%H4310><s%> has appointed <S%H3259><s%> it.

Are there yet <S%H5750><s%> the treasures <S%H214><s%> of wickedness <S%H7562><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> and the scant <S%H7332><s%> measure <S%H374><s%> that is abominable? <S%H2194><s%>
Shall I count them pure <S%H2135><s%> with the wicked <S%H7562><s%> balances, <S%H3976><s%> and with the bag <S%H3599><s%> of deceitful <S%H4820><s%> weights? <S%H68><s%>

For the rich <S%H6223><s%> men thereof are full <S%H4390><s%> of violence, <S%H2555><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> thereof have spoken <S%H1696><s%> lies, <S%H8267><s%> and their tongue <S%H3956><s%> is deceitful <S%H7423><s%> in their mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
Therefore also <S%H1571><s%> will I make you sick <S%H2470><s%> in smiting <S%H5221><s%> you, in making you desolate <S%H8074><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> of your sins. <S%H2403><s%>

You shall eat, <S%H398><s%> but not be satisfied; <S%H7646><s%> and your casting <S%H3445><s%> down shall be in the middle <S%H7130><s%> of you; and you shall take <S%H5253><s%> hold, <S%H5253><s%> but shall not deliver; <S%H6403><s%> and that which <S%H834><s%> you deliver <S%H6403><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> up to the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

You shall sow, <S%H2232><s%> but you shall not reap; <S%H7114><s%> you shall tread <S%H1869><s%> the olives, <S%H2132><s%> but you shall not anoint <S%H5480><s%> you with oil; <S%H8081><s%> and sweet <S%H8492><s%> wine, <S%H8492><s%> but shall not drink <S%H8354><s%> wine. <S%H3196><s%>

For the statutes <S%H2708><s%> of Omri <S%H6018><s%> are kept, <S%H8104><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the works <S%H4639><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Ahab, <S%H256><s%> and you walk <S%H3212><s%> in their counsels; <S%H4156><s%> that I should make <S%H5414><s%> you a desolation, <S%H8047><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> thereof an hissing: <S%H8322><s%> therefore you shall bear <S%H5375><s%> the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of my people. <S%H5971><s%>
